com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface AnimationBindingListener


  • public interface AnimationBindingListener
    Listener that receives events when a GraphBinding is activated or is finished.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCanceledBeforeStart(AnimationBinding binding)
      Called when a listener (including this one) returns false from shouldStart(com.facebook.litho.animation.AnimationBinding)
      void onFinish(AnimationBinding binding)
      Called when a GraphBinding is finished, meaning all of its nodes are finished.
      void onScheduledToStartLater(AnimationBinding binding)
      Called when going to be started later.
      void onWillStart(AnimationBinding binding)
      Called when GraphBinding.activate() is called on the relevant binding.
      boolean shouldStart(AnimationBinding binding)
      Return 'false' to cancel this animation and keep it from starting.

    • Method Detail

      • onScheduledToStartLater

        void onScheduledToStartLater(AnimationBinding binding)
        Called when going to be started later. For example: when a set of AnimationBinding starts, but this particular binding will come into play later. This may be called multiple times in case of several nested sets

      • onWillStart

        void onWillStart(AnimationBinding binding)
        Called when GraphBinding.activate() is called on the relevant binding.

      • onFinish

        void onFinish(AnimationBinding binding)
        Called when a GraphBinding is finished, meaning all of its nodes are finished.

      • onCanceledBeforeStart

        void onCanceledBeforeStart(AnimationBinding binding)
        Called when a listener (including this one) returns false from shouldStart(com.facebook.litho.animation.AnimationBinding)

      • shouldStart

        boolean shouldStart(AnimationBinding binding)
        Return 'false' to cancel this animation and keep it from starting.
        Returns:
        shouldStart whether to start this animation (i.e. return false to cancel it and prevent it from running)
